## drm-datepickerjs package

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[DatePicker](./drm-datepickerjs.datepicker.md)

</td><td>

DatePicker is a simple picker. Used when a single selection date will suffice

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[EventEmitter](./drm-datepickerjs.eventemitter.md)

</td><td>

Event Emitter class

Type of Events that match a string to a callback, one key - one listener

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[MultiSelectPicker](./drm-datepickerjs.multiselectpicker.md)

</td><td>

Multi Select picker allows user to select more than one date.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[RangePicker](./drm-datepickerjs.rangepicker.md)

</td><td>

RangePicker allows user to select range of dates

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
